termsPage.title: Terms and Conditions
termsPage.introduction.title: 1. Introduction
termsPage.introduction.p1: These Website Standard Terms and Conditions written on this webpage shall manage your use of our website, {websiteName} accessible at {websiteUrl}.
termsPage.introduction.p2: These Terms will be applied fully and affect to your use of this Website. By using this Website, you agreed to accept all terms and conditions written in here. You must not use this Website if you disagree with any of these Website Standard Terms and Conditions.
termsPage.ipRights.title: 2. Intellectual Property Rights
termsPage.ipRights.p1: Other than the content you own, under these Terms, {websiteName} and/or its licensors own all the intellectual property rights and materials contained in this Website.
termsPage.ipRights.p2: You are granted limited license only for purposes of viewing the material contained on this Website.
termsPage.restrictions.title: 3. Restrictions
termsPage.restrictions.p1: You are specifically restricted from all of the following:
termsPage.restrictions.item1: publishing any Website material in any other media;
termsPage.restrictions.item2: selling, sublicensing and/or otherwise commercializing any Website material;
termsPage.restrictions.item3: publicly performing and/or showing any Website material;
termsPage.restrictions.item4: using this Website in any way that is or may be damaging to this Website;
termsPage.restrictions.item5: using this Website in any way that impacts user access to this Website;
termsPage.restrictions.item6: using this Website contrary to applicable laws and regulations, or in any way may cause harm to the Website, or to any person or business entity;
termsPage.restrictions.item7: engaging in any data mining, data harvesting, data extracting or any other similar activity in relation to this Website;
termsPage.restrictions.item8: using this Website to engage in any advertising or marketing.
termsPage.restrictions.p2: Certain areas of this Website are restricted from being access by you and {websiteName} may further restrict access by you to any areas of this Website, at any time, in absolute discretion. Any user ID and password you may have for this Website are confidential and you must maintain confidentiality as well.
termsPage.yourContent.title: 4. Your Content
termsPage.yourContent.p1: In these Website Standard Terms and Conditions, “Your Content” shall mean any audio, video text, images or other material you choose to display on this Website. By displaying Your Content, you grant {websiteName} a non-exclusive, worldwide irrevocable, sub licensable license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate and distribute it in any and all media.
termsPage.yourContent.p2: Your Content must be your own and must not be invading any third-party’s rights. {websiteName} reserves the right to remove any of Your Content from this Website at any time without notice.
termsPage.noWarranties.title: 5. No warranties
termsPage.noWarranties.p1: This Website is provided “as is,” with all faults, and {websiteName} express no representations or warranties, of any kind related to this Website or the materials contained on this Website. Also, nothing contained on this Website shall be interpreted as advising you.
termsPage.limitationOfLiability.title: 6. Limitation of liability
termsPage.limitationOfLiability.p1: In no event shall {websiteName}, nor any of its officers, directors and employees, shall be held liable for anything arising out of or in any way connected with your use of this Website whether such liability is under contract. {websiteName}, including its officers, directors and employees shall not be held liable for any indirect, consequential or special liability arising out of or in any way related to your use of this Website.
termsPage.indemnification.title: 7. Indemnification
termsPage.indemnification.p1: You hereby indemnify to the fullest extent {websiteName} from and against any and/or all liabilities, costs, demands, causes of action, damages and expenses arising in any way related to your breach of any of the provisions of these Terms.
termsPage.severability.title: 8. Severability
termsPage.severability.p1: If any provision of these Terms is found to be invalid under any applicable law, such provisions shall be deleted without affecting the remaining provisions herein.
termsPage.variationOfTerms.title: 9. Variation of Terms
termsPage.variationOfTerms.p1: {websiteName} is permitted to revise these Terms at any time as it sees fit, and by using this Website you are expected to review these Terms on a regular basis.
termsPage.assignment.title: 10. Assignment
termsPage.assignment.p1: The {websiteName} is allowed to assign, transfer, and subcontract its rights and/or obligations under these Terms without any notification. However, you are not allowed to assign, transfer, or subcontract any of your rights and/or obligations under these Terms.
termsPage.entireAgreement.title: 11. Entire Agreement
termsPage.entireAgreement.p1: These Terms constitute the entire agreement between {websiteName} and you in relation to your use of this Website, and supersede all prior agreements and understandings.
termsPage.governingLaw.title: 12. Governing Law & Jurisdiction
termsPage.governingLaw.p1: These Terms will be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of [Your Country/State], and you submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of the state and federal courts located in [Your Country/State] for the resolution of any disputes.
privacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. It is LancerPages' policy to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect from you across our website, {websiteUrl}, and other sites we own and operate.
privacyPolicy.gdpr.dataCollectionText: We collect only essential data for platform functionality. We use cookies for user authentication (essential) and basic analytics (non-essential, requires consent).
privacyPolicy.cookies.table.name: Cookie Name
privacyPolicy.userRights.intro: You have certain rights regarding your personal data, subject to local data protection laws. These may include the right to:
privacyPolicy.userRights.erase: Request deletion of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.userRights.export: Request a copy of your personal data.
privacyPolicy.userRights.withdrawConsent: Withdraw consent for non-essential data processing (e.g., via our cookie banner).
privacyPolicy.userRights.contact: To exercise these rights, or if you have questions about our privacy practices, please contact us at {email}.
privacyPolicy.navigateToProfileEditPlace: Navigation to profile edit/data management page would occur here.
privacyPolicy.infoCollectGen.title: 1. Information We Collect (General)
privacyPolicy.infoCollectGen.p1: We only ask for personal information when we truly need it to provide a service to you. We collect it by fair and lawful means, with your knowledge and consent. We also let you know why we’re collecting it and how it will be used.
privacyPolicy.infoCollectGen.logData.p1: When you visit our website, our servers may automatically log the standard data provided by your web browser. This may include your computer’s Internet Protocol (IP) address, your browser type and version, the pages you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on each page, and other details.
privacyPolicy.infoCollectGen.personalInf: We may ask for personal information, such as your:
Contact information (if you choose to provide it for your public profile)
Professional details (domains, bio, links, location for your public profile)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.title: 2. How We Use Your Information (General)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.p1: We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item1: Provide, operate, and maintain our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item2: Improve, personalize, and expand our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item3: Understand and analyze how you use our website
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item4: Develop new products, services, features, and functionality
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item5: Communicate with you, either directly or through one of our partners, including for customer service, to provide you with updates and other information relating to the website, and for marketing and promotional purposes (with your consent)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item6: Process your transactions (e.g. if premium features are introduced)
privacyPolicy.howWeUseGen.item8: Facilitate the public directory of freelancers as per your profile settings
privacyPolicy.sharingGen.title: 3. Sharing Your Information (General)
privacyPolicy.sharingGen.p1: The primary purpose of LancerPages is to create a public directory. Information you provide for your public profile (name, domains, bio, links, city, country) will be visible to users of the website.
privacyPolicy.sharingGen.p2: We do not share your personally identifying information publicly or with third-parties, except when required to by law, or with your explicit consent for specific features (e.g., connecting with clients if a premium feature is enabled).
privacyPolicy.sharingGen.p3: We may share aggregated, non-personally identifiable information publicly and with our partners – for example, in trend reports about use of our services.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityGen.title: 4. Data Security (General)
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityGen.p1: We take security seriously and take reasonable steps to protect your personal information from loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification. That said, we advise that no method of electronic transmission or storage is 100% secure, and cannot guarantee absolute data security.
privacyPolicy.dataSecurityGen.p2: Your account information is protected by a password, which you should keep confidential. It is important that you protect against unauthorized access to your account and information by choosing your password carefully and by signing off after you have finished using your account.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionGen.title: 5. Data Retention (General)
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionGen.p1: We only retain collected information for as long as necessary to provide you with your requested service. What data we store, we’ll protect within commercially acceptable means to prevent loss and theft, as well as unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use or modification.
privacyPolicy.dataRetentionGen.p2: You can request deletion of your personal data by contacting us. Please note that some information may be retained if required by law or for legitimate business purposes (like fraud prevention).
privacyPolicy.cookiesGen.title: 6. Cookies (General)
privacyPolicy.cookiesGen.p1: We use “cookies” to collect information about you and your activity across our site. A cookie is a small piece of data that our website stores on your computer, and accesses each time you visit, so we can understand how you use our site. This helps us serve you content based on preferences you have specified. You can disable cookies in your browser, but this may affect your ability to use some features of our website.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyGen.title: 7. Third-Party Services (General)
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyGen.p1: Our website may link to external sites that are not operated by us. Please be aware that we have no control over the content and policies of those sites, and cannot accept responsibility or liability for their respective privacy practices.
privacyPolicy.thirdPartyGen.p2: We use Firebase for authentication, database, and analytics. Firebase is a Google product and its use is governed by Google's privacy policies.
privacyPolicy.childrensPrivacyGen.title: 8. Children's Privacy (General)
privacyPolicy.childrensPrivacyGen.p1: Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13 (or a higher age threshold where applicable under local laws), and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child without verification of parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsGen.title: 9. Your Rights (General)
privacyPolicy.yourRightsGen.p1: You have the right to be informed about how your personal data is used, the right to access your personal data, and the right to have your personal data corrected or deleted. You also have the right to withdraw consent at any time where LancerPages is relying on consent to process your personal data.
privacyPolicy.yourRightsGen.p2: Depending on your location, you may have other rights under local data protection laws. To exercise these rights, please contact us.
privacyPolicy.changesGen.title: 10. Changes to This Policy (General)
privacyPolicy.changesGen.p1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.
privacyPolicy.contactGen.title: 11. Contact Us (General)
privacyPolicy.contactGen.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at {email}.
aboutPage.title: About LancerPages
aboutPage.welcome: Welcome to LancerPages – your go-to directory for discovering skilled freelance professionals from around the globe!
aboutPage.mission.title: Our Mission
aboutPage.mission.p1: At LancerPages, our mission is simple: to connect talented freelancers with clients who need their expertise. We aim to create a straightforward, accessible platform where professionals can showcase their skills and clients can easily find the right talent for their projects.
aboutPage.why.title: Why LancerPages?
aboutPage.why.p1: In a world brimming with talent, finding the right freelancer or getting your skills noticed can be challenging. LancerPages is designed to bridge that gap. We provide:
aboutPage.why.item1: A curated directory of professionals across various domains.
aboutPage.why.item2: Easy-to-use search and filtering tools to find the perfect match.
aboutPage.why.item3: A platform for freelancers to create detailed profiles highlighting their expertise, experience, and portfolio.
aboutPage.why.item4: A community space for interaction and networking (like our Chat feature!).
aboutPage.forFreelancers.title: For Freelancers
aboutPage.forFreelancers.p1: Showcase your skills, experience, and portfolio to a global audience. Create your profile, list your domains of expertise, and let potential clients find you. LancerPages is your space to shine and grow your freelance career.
aboutPage.forClients.title: For Clients & Hirers
aboutPage.forClients.p1: Browse through a diverse pool of talented freelancers. Whether you're looking for a designer, developer, marketer, writer, or any other skilled professional, LancerPages helps you find the right person for your project quickly and efficiently.
aboutPage.commitment.title: Our Commitment
aboutPage.commitment.p1: We are committed to continuously improving LancerPages to make it the most effective and user-friendly platform for both freelancers and clients. We believe in transparency, quality, and fostering a supportive community.
aboutPage.getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
aboutPage.getInTouch.p1: We value your feedback and suggestions. If you have any questions or ideas on how we can improve LancerPages, please don't hesitate to reach out to us at {email}.
aboutPage.thankYou: Thank you for being a part of the LancerPages community!
paymentPage.title: Support LancerPages & Unlock Contacts
paymentPage.intro: To get access to contact details for all listed freelancers for 1 year, please make a one-time payment. This helps us maintain and improve the LancerPages directory.
paymentPage.instructions: After payment, please send a screenshot of your transaction and your LancerPages registered email (if any) to <bold>{email}</bold> for verification and account activation. Access will be granted manually within 24-48 hours.
paymentPage.cryptoNetworkNote: Please ensure you are sending to the correct network (e.g., TRC20 for USDT on Tron, ERC20 for USDT on Ethereum).
paymentPage.admin.paypalLink: Admin to add PayPal.me link or email here
paymentPage.admin.upiId: Admin to add UPI ID here (e.g., yourname@okhdfcbank)
paymentPage.admin.btcAddress: Admin to add BTC address here
paymentPage.admin.ethAddress: Admin to add ETH address here
paymentPage.admin.usdtAddress: Admin to add USDT (TRC20/ERC20) address here
paymentPage.admin.qrUpi: Admin to add link to UPI QR code image here
paymentPage.admin.qrCrypto: Admin to add link to a general crypto QR code image if applicable

editProfile.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account and all associated data? This cannot be undone.
editProfile.deleteSuccessAlert: Your LancerPages data has been deleted. Your authentication account will be removed shortly if you do not log back in.
editProfile.deleteErrorAlert: An error occurred while deleting your account data. Please contact support.
gdpr.banner.text: We use cookies to provide essential functionality and to improve your experience. By continuing, you agree to our use of cookies. See our {privacyPolicyLink} for more details.
